titles.title: Public Safety Tax Cut Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit for police officers and professional firefighters, and to exclude from income certain benefits received by public safety volunteers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/21/1999--Introduced. Public Safety Tax Cut Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) provide a $1,000 tax credit for full-time police officers and firefighters; and (2) exclude from gross income the value of any public services benefits (water, sewer, trash pickup, and other similar services) received by a public safety volunteer (a volunteer firefighter or volunteer auxiliary police officer).
